item.description:
Guys unfortunately I do not know how to stop this automatic event planning at Sam and Hanna's. We have had that particular party about 5 times now :)

This is the real thing though. That time and date work for me. Why don't we meet up for some food, fun and conversation at the Wild Colonial Tavern. Never been there but it has gotten good reviews.

Hope you can all make it.

Cheers,
Brad
item.name: The Providence German Language March Meeting
